text: The number of points scored by a football player in the first eight games of a season are shown: 20, 25, 22, 30, 27, 28, 19, 26.  What would happen to the data distribution if he scored 10, 40, 11, and 45 points in his next four games?
answers: The data distribution would become more peaked and more widely spread.
The data distribution would become less peaked and more widely spread.
The data distribution would become more peaked and less widely spread.
The data distribution would become less peaked and less widely spread.
